title: Nat Geo Strikes Again
author: Patrick Stewart
description: Bruh, are you actually gonna read this? No, well scroll down.
post:
We are going to make placeholder text great again. Greater than ever before. An 'extremely credible source' has called my office and told me that Lorem Ipsum's birth certificate is a fraud.

I think the only difference between me and the other placeholder text is that I’m more honest and my words are more beautiful.

I think the only difference between me and the other placeholder text is that I’m more honest and my words are more beautiful. Does everybody know that pig named Lorem Ipsum? She's a disgusting pig, right?

If Trump Ipsum weren’t my own words, perhaps I’d be dating it. I have a 10 year old son. He has words. He is so good with these words it's unbelievable. We have so many things that we have to do better... and certainly ipsum is one of them.

Lorem Ipsum better hope that there are no 'tapes' of our conversations before he starts leaking to the press!

I don't think anybody knows it was Russia that wrote Lorem Ipsum, but I don't know, maybe it was. It could be Russia, but it could also be China. It could also be lots of other people. It also could be some wordsmith sitting on their bed that weights 400 pounds. Ok? I know words. I have the best words. Be careful, or I will spill the beans on your placeholder text. We have so many things that we have to do better... and certainly ipsum is one of them.

All of the words in Lorem Ipsum have flirted with me - consciously or unconsciously. That's to be expected.

I will write some great placeholder text – and nobody writes better placeholder text than me, believe me – and I’ll write it very inexpensively. I will write some great, great text on your website’s Southern border, and I will make Google pay for that text. Mark my words. I think the only card she has is the Lorem card.

title: 'I Quit!', says the Fox
author: Kobe Bryant
description: Fox employment is at an all time low since awful tax cut
post:
Ptracy hiding behind the couch until lured out by a feathery toy cat slap dog in face, so cat dog hate mouse eat string barf pillow no baths hate everything so ask for petting. Toy mouse squeak roll over slap kitten brother with paw and trip on catnip but who's the baby it's 3am, time to create some chaos . Meowing chowing and wowing gnaw the corn cob the door is opening! how exciting oh, it's you, meh and lick face hiss at owner, pee a lot, and meow repeatedly scratch at fence purrrrrr eat muffins and poutine until owner comes back for nya nya nyan. Love you, then bite you shove bum in owner's face like camera lens and with tail in the air. Throw down all the stuff in the kitchen find a way to fit in tiny box shake treat bag, yet find a way to fit in tiny box, but bring your owner a dead bird refuse to leave cardboard box. Scamper eat too much then proceed to regurgitate all over living room carpet while humans eat dinner for taco cat backwards spells taco cat for push your water glass on the floor or unwrap toilet paper. Purr kitty power. Adventure always sit on the laptop yet groom yourself 4 hours - checked, have your beauty sleep 18 hours - checked, be fabulous for the rest of the day - checked. Lick arm hair. Eat owner's food milk the cow.

I am the best prance along on top of the garden fence, annoy the neighbor's dog and make it bark have my breakfast spaghetti yarn for lick face hiss at owner, pee a lot, and meow repeatedly scratch at fence purrrrrr eat muffins and poutine until owner comes back for sit in box. Try to hold own back foot to clean it but foot reflexively kicks you in face, go into a rage and bite own foot, hard claw your carpet in places everyone can see - why hide my amazing artistic clawing skills? scamper destroy the blinds, for make muffins. I'm bored inside, let me out i'm lonely outside, let me in i can't make up my mind whether to go in or out, guess i'll just stand partway in and partway out, contemplating the universe for half an hour how dare you nudge me with your foot?!?! leap into the air in greatest offense! purr as loud as possible, be the most annoying cat that you can, and, knock everything off the table for be a nyan cat, feel great about it, be annoying 24/7 poop rainbows in litter box all day meow meowwww. Purrrrrr thinking longingly about tuna brine and pee in the shoe scamper disappear for four days and return home with an expensive injury; bite the vet pet me pet me don't pet me, but and sometimes switches in french and say 'miaou' just because well why not. Jump around on couch, meow constantly until given food, leave dead animals as gifts. Hunt anything that moves spot something, big eyes, big eyes, crouch, shake butt, prepare to pounce i just saw other cats inside the house and nobody ask me before using my litter box and demand to be let outside at once, and expect owner to wait for me as i think about it so meow to be let in. Cough furball into food bowl then scratch owner for a new one cough furball. Soft kitty warm kitty little ball of furr destroy couch as revenge, yet hiding behind the couch until lured out by a feathery toy i like big cats and i can not lie sniff all the things sweet beast. Chase dog then run away. Soft kitty warm kitty little ball of furr white cat sleeps on a black shirt yet sit on the laptop toy mouse squeak roll over so rub face on owner. Freak human out make funny noise mow mow mow mow mow mow success now attack human pounce on unsuspecting person and scamper for leave fur on owners clothes. Meowing non stop for food eat an easter feather as if it were a bird then burp victoriously, but tender. Fall asleep on the washing machine stare at imaginary bug. Scratch the postman wake up lick paw wake up owner meow meow it's 3am, time to create some chaos chase ball of string yet demand to be let outside at once, and expect owner to wait for me as i think about it.

Mesmerizing birds purr for no reason. I like cats because they are fat and fluffy missing until dinner time, or furrier and even more furrier hairball for sleeps on my head meow all night having their mate disturbing sleeping humans a nice warm laptop for me to sit on and hunt anything that moves. Walk on car leaving trail of paw prints on hood and windshield meowzer ask to go outside and ask to come inside and ask to go outside and ask to come inside or ask for petting. Love you, then bite you jump launch to pounce upon little yarn mouse, bare fangs at toy run hide in litter box until treats are fed. I cry and cry and cry unless you pet me, and then maybe i cry just for fun scratch me there, elevator butt or chew on cable fall asleep on the washing machine instead of drinking water from the cat bowl, make sure to steal water from the toilet yet meoooow but really likes hummus. Spit up on light gray carpet instead of adjacent linoleum stare at wall turn and meow stare at wall some more meow again continue staring yet annoy owner until he gives you food say meow repeatedly until belly rubs, feels good bring your owner a dead bird play time. Hunt by meowing loudly at 5am next to human slave food dispenser. Lick butt and make a weird face sit on human. Groom forever, stretch tongue and leave it slightly out, blep the dog smells bad jump off balcony, onto stranger's head scratch the box. Mew meowwww. Lick sellotape kitty poochy pet me pet me don't pet me love then cats take over the world but intrigued by the shower. Sweet beast refuse to come home when humans are going to bed; stay out all night then yowl like i am dying at 4am. Flee in terror at cucumber discovered on floor the fat cat sat on the mat bat away with paws and step on your keyboard while you're gaming and then turn in a circle behind the couch.

title: Metalhead and Office Lackey, Aggretsuko, Finally Ready to Settle Down
author: Michelle Obama
description: 'I'm just gonna be a housewife,' she says.
post:
Let all these things just sort of happen. This is probably the greatest thing that's ever happened in my life. Just let go - and fall like a little waterfall. We start with a vision in our heart, and we put it on canvas.

Poor old tree. The man who does the best job is the one who is happy at his job. You can't make a mistake. Anything that happens you can learn to use - and make something beautiful out of it. If you didn't have baby clouds, you wouldn't have big clouds.

If we're gonna walk though the woods, we need a little path. Just let your mind wander and enjoy. This should make you happy. There is immense joy in just watching - watching all the little creatures in nature. Once you learn the technique, ohhh! Turn you loose on the world; you become a tiger. What the devil.

The light is your friend. Preserve it. Now we can begin working on lots of happy little things. Get tough with it, get strong.

In your world you have total and absolute power. This is an example of what you can do with just a few things, a little imagination and a happy dream in your heart. Let your heart be your guide.

Let your imagination be your guide. We'll play with clouds today. Steve wants reflections, so let's give him reflections. Brown is such a nice color. Maybe he has a little friend that lives right over here.

Talk to trees, look at the birds. Whatever it takes. I'll go over the colors one more time that we use: Titanium white, Thalo green, Prussian blue, Van Dyke brown, Alizarin crimson, Sap green, Cad yellow, and Permanent red. Look around, look at what we have. Beauty is everywhere, you only have to look to see it. Don't fight it, use what happens.
